io.s4.test
类 Message

java.lang.Object
  io.s4.test.Message

public class Message
extends java.lang.Object

Messages that can be send/received by client. They typically correspond to events that are sent/received.

构造方法详细信息

Message

public Message(java.lang.String stream,
               java.lang.String clazz,
               java.lang.String object)
Key-less event message.

参数：
stream - Name of stream associated with corresponding event.
clazz - Class of event object.
object - String representation of the event. This is the string that Gson will convert into/from the event object.

Message

public Message(java.lang.String stream,
               java.lang.String[] keyNames,
               java.lang.String clazz,
               java.lang.String object)
Keyed event message.

参数：
stream - Name of stream associated with corresponding event.
keyNames - array of key names. Typically, the getter corresponding to each string in this array will be invoked on the event object, and the values concatenated, to produce the routing key.
clazz - Class of event object.
object - String representation of the event. This is the string that Gson will convert into/from the event object.
方法详细信息

fromJson

public static Message fromJson(org.json.JSONObject json)
                        throws org.json.JSONException
Create from JSON.

参数：
json - JSON representation of message
返回：
Message object.
抛出：
org.json.JSONException - if the JSON is invalid.

toJson

public void toJson(org.json.JSONObject json)
            throws org.json.JSONException
Convert message into JSON.

参数：
json - JSON will be written into this object.
抛出：
org.json.JSONException - if writing fails.
